
```{r}
library(tidyverse)

input_file <- read.csv(file.choose(),
                       col.names = "depth") 

input_file %>%
  summarise(n_increases = length(depth[depth > lag(depth)]))

#I want to inspect this
input_file %>%
  mutate(row = 1:n()) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = row,
             y = depth)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth()
```
